# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)
- Electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.
- Entities affected: burner-mining-drill, burner-inserter

### Errors when using stone furnaces
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before using them.
- Entities affected: stone-furnace

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power source before using them.
- Entities affected: steam-engine

### Errors when using electricity groups
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network before using them.
- Entities affected: electricity-group

### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe groups are not empty before using them.
- Entities affected: pipe-group

### Errors when using belt groups
- Ensure that belt groups are not empty before using them.
- Entities affected: belt-group

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables defined by the agent were found in the provided logs.
